meanings.sent1: The lost wallet was claimable at the lost and found office.
meanings.sent2: The prize for the contest was claimable by anyone who met the requirements.
meanings.sent3: The claimable treasure chest turned out to be filled with chocolate coins.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a claimable prize, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The claimable land stretched as far as the eye could see, waiting to be owned.

meanings.sent1: The unclaimed items on the table were all claimable by the attendees.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house was claimable for anyone willing to renovate it.
meanings.sent3: The claimable seat at the front of the bus was quickly taken by an elderly lady.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt like a claimable prize, waiting for someone to cherish it.
meanings.sent5: The claimable title of champion was up for grabs in the upcoming competition.
